segments.text: This kitchen is a disgusting flood zone right now.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water gushing from the sink, soaking the floor like a bad leak.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The woman's standing in it, clueless and getting her shoes wet.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: That puddle's gross; it'll attract all sorts of dirt.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Kids raiding the cookie jar on a shaky stool—filthy hands in there.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl's begging for one, but crumbs everywhere soon.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Open cabinets, dust and who knows what inside.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The towel she's using looks damp already from the splash.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Outside garden's clean, but in here it's a mess I can't stand.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Dishes stacked up, waiting to be dirtied more.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The whole scene reeks of neglect and sloppiness.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Water streaming down the cabinets—nasty stains coming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wouldn't step foot in that puddle for anything.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Turn off that faucet before it's unbearable.
segments.speaker: PAR
